ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: You can put a whole 1 practice point into research.. i m hoping you don t fail.. at about 2pp a rune that can get extremely expensive.. Fetko, lvl 18 wizard,
ygData.messageBody:
You can put a whole 1 practice point into research.. i'm hoping you don't
fail.. at about 2pp a rune that can get extremely expensive..

Fetko, lvl 18 wizard, Mith Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: John Cuyle <johncuyle@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 3:40 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Research


> From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
>
> So, when you research a spell does it have a chance of failing like other
> trade skills? Is there a cap to how many points you can pump in at your
> guild?
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <sdunn@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 7:17 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Research
>
>
> > From: sdunn@...
> >
> > By any chance would anyone have found the tombs for reasearch for any of

> >

> > Fastus, 22 Dark Elf Wizard, The Rathe
